Description:
Model
Brand: ASUS
Series: ROG STRIX LC II 280 ARGB
Model: 90RC00C1-M0AAY0
Type: Liquid Cooling System


Block
Block Compatibility: Intel LGA 2066 / 2011-3 / 2011 / 1366 / 1200 / 115x

AMD AM4 / TR4
Block Dim.: 80.00 x 80.00 x 45.00 mm
Block Material: Copper


Radiator
Radiator Size: 315.00 x 143.00 x 30.00 mm
Radiator Material: Aluminum


Fan
Fan Size: 2 Fan Slots (140 mm)
Fan Dim.: 140.00 x 140.00 x 25.50 mm
Fan RPM: 700 - 2100 RPM +/- 10%
Fan Air Flow: 102.3 CFM
Fan Noise: 35.7 dB (A)
Color: Black
LED Color: ARGB


Tube
Tube Dim.: 380 mm
Tube Material: Sleeved Rubber


Features
Features: Chipset Socket compatibility: Intel LGA 1700/1150/1151/1155/1156/1200/2066 & AMD AM4/TR4.
 
Cool & Quiet: Seventh Gen Asetek pump delivers exceptional cooling and minimal noise with an operating range starting at 840 rpm.

ROG Axial-tech radiator fans: provide optimized airflow and static pressure.

ARGB lighting: Individually addressable RGB lighting on the NCVM-coated pump cover and the radiator fans conveys a sleek, modern design.

High-quality tubing: Reinforced, sleeved tubing offers increased durability.

Aesthetic: Perfectly complements ROG motherboards to bring out the best of your build from center stage.


Package Contents
Package Contents: 1 x Liquid Cooler (Pre-applied thermal compound)
1 x Accessory Pack of Screws and brackets
2 x 140 mm ARGB Radiator Fan
1 x USB cable for software control 
1 x 1-to-2 Fan Splitter Cable
1 x 1 to 4 ARGB spliter cable 
1 x Quick Start Guide 
1 x ROG Sticker
Label: Líquida Asus ROG Strix LC II 280 ARGB
